title: Huawei Watch_How can I connect my watch to a new Wi-Fi network?
answer:
Swipe left on the watch's home screen, go to **Settings** > **Wi-Fi settings**, touch **Add network** > **Open on phone,** and enter the Wi-Fi password on your phone.
![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/73441_dzx4y.gif) NOTE: 

When connecting to a new Wi-Fi network, ensure that your watch stays connected to your phone over Bluetooth.
